019package com.plotsquared.core.command;
020
021import com.google.inject.Inject;
022import com.plotsquared.core.configuration.Settings;
023import com.plotsquared.core.configuration.caption.TranslatableCaption;
024import com.plotsquared.core.events.PlotFlagRemoveEvent;
025import com.plotsquared.core.events.Result;
026import com.plotsquared.core.permissions.Permission;
027import com.plotsquared.core.player.PlotPlayer;
028import com.plotsquared.core.plot.Plot;
029import com.plotsquared.core.plot.flag.PlotFlag;
030import com.plotsquared.core.plot.flag.implementations.DoneFlag;
031import com.plotsquared.core.util.EventDispatcher;
032import com.plotsquared.core.util.Permissions;
033import net.kyori.adventure.text.Component;
034import net.kyori.adventure.text.minimessage.tag.Tag;
035import net.kyori.adventure.text.minimessage.tag.resolver.TagResolver;
036import org.checkerframework.checker.nullness.qual.NonNull;
037
038@CommandDeclaration(command = "continue",
039        permission = "plots.continue",
040        category = CommandCategory.SETTINGS,
041        requiredType = RequiredType.PLAYER)
042public class Continue extends SubCommand {
043
044    private final EventDispatcher eventDispatcher;
045
046    @Inject
047    public Continue(final @NonNull EventDispatcher eventDispatcher) {
048        this.eventDispatcher = eventDispatcher;
049    }
050
051    @Override
052    public boolean onCommand(PlotPlayer<?> player, String[] args) {
053        Plot plot = player.getCurrentPlot();
054        if ((plot == null) || !plot.hasOwner()) {
055            player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("errors.not_in_plot"));
056            return false;
057        }
058        if (!plot.isOwner(player.getUUID()) && !Permissions
059                .hasPermission(player, Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_COMMAND_CONTINUE)) {
060            player.sendMessage(
061                    TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission"),
062                    TagResolver.resolver("node", Tag.inserting(
063                            TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_plot_perms").toComponent(player)
064                    ))
065            );
066            return false;
067        }
068        if (!DoneFlag.isDone(plot)) {
069            player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("done.done_not_done"));
070            return false;
071        }
072        int size = plot.getConnectedPlots().size();
073        if (!Settings.Done.COUNTS_TOWARDS_LIMIT && (player.getAllowedPlots()
074                < player.getPlotCount() + size)) {
075            player.sendMessage(
076                    TranslatableCaption.of("permission.cant_claim_more_plots"),
077                    TagResolver.resolver("amount", Tag.inserting(Component.text(player.getAllowedPlots())))
078            );
079            return false;
080        }
081        if (plot.getRunning() > 0) {
082            player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("errors.wait_for_timer"));
083            return false;
084        }
085        PlotFlag<?, ?> plotFlag = plot.getFlagContainer().getFlag(DoneFlag.class);
086        PlotFlagRemoveEvent event =
087                this.eventDispatcher.callFlagRemove(plotFlag, plot);
088        if (event.getEventResult() == Result.DENY) {
089            player.sendMessage(
090                    TranslatableCaption.of("events.event_denied"),
091                    TagResolver.resolver("value", Tag.inserting(Component.text("Done flag removal")))
092            );
093            return true;
094        }
095        plot.removeFlag(event.getFlag());
096        player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("done.done_removed"));
097        return true;
098    }
099
100}
